mapper.sql: ID, IV, IFR, CD, P, TPR, CV, DAYSYSTEMCOP, MONSYSTEMCOP, YEARSYSTEMCOP, INSTSYSTEMCOP
mapper.insert: insert into TRAFFIC_REAL_TIME (ID, IV, IFR, CD, P, TPR, CV, DAYSYSTEMCOP, MONSYSTEMCOP, YEARSYSTEMCOP, INSTSYSTEMCOP) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ifr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{p,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tpr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daysystemcop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monsystemcop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yearsystemcop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{instsystemcop,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update TRAFFIC_REAL_TIME set IV = #{iv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IFR = #{ifr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CD = #{cd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, P = #{p,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TPR = #{tpr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CV = #{cv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAYSYSTEMCOP = #{daysystemcop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MONSYSTEMCOP = #{monsystemcop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YEARSYSTEMCOP = #{yearsystemcop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INSTSYSTEMCOP = #{instsystemcop,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
